text: An election to Laois County Council took place on 27 June 1991 as part of that year's Irish local elections. 25 councillors were elected from five electoral divisions by PR-STV voting for a five-year term of office. ==Results by party== {| class=wikitable ! colspan=2 align=center|Party ! valign=top|Seats ! valign=top|± ! valign=top|First Pref. votes ! valign=top|FPv% ! valign=top|±% |- | align=right|13 | align=right|-1 | align=right|11,454 | align=right|49.33% | align=right| |- | align=right|9 | align=right|- | align=right|7,910 | align=right|34.07% | align=right| |- | align=right|1 | align=right|- | align=right|1,672 | align=right|7.20% | align=right| |- | align=right|1 | align=right|+1 | align=right|944 | align=right|4.07% | align=right| |- | align=right|1 | align=right|- | align=right|1,239 | align=right|5.34% | align=right| |- | colspan=2 align=center|Totals | align=right |25 | align=center|- | align=right |23,219 | align=center|100% | align=center|— |} ==Results by Electoral Area== ===Borris-in-Ossory=== ===Emo=== ===Luggacurren=== ===Portlaoise=== ===Tinnahinch=== ==External links== * Official website * irishelectionliterature Category:1991 Irish local elections 1991
title: 1991 Laois County Council election
